Queries.Query: SELECT Product.id, bar_code, name, Category.type as category, potential, learned FROM Product LEFT JOIN Category on Category.id = Product.category;

SELECT Clients.serial_number, Product.bar_code, Category.type, Waste.time_disposed FROM Waste LEFT JOIN Clients ON Clients.id = Waste.client LEFT JOIN Product ON Product.id = Waste.product LEFT JOIN Category ON Category.id = Waste.category WHERE Waste.client = {?ClientId};

SELECT Category.type, COUNT(*) as count FROM Waste LEFT JOIN Clients ON Clients.id = Waste.client LEFT JOIN Product ON Product.id = Waste.product LEFT JOIN Category ON Category.id = Waste.category WHERE Waste.client = {?ClientId} AND time_disposed BETWEEN '{?CurrentMonthFD}' AND '{?CurrentMonthLD}' GROUP BY Category.type;

SELECT Category.type, COUNT(*) as count FROM Waste LEFT JOIN Clients ON Clients.id = Waste.client LEFT JOIN Product ON Product.id = Waste.product LEFT JOIN Category ON Category.id = Waste.category WHERE time_disposed BETWEEN '{?CurrentMonthFD}' AND '{?CurrentMonthLD}' GROUP BY Category.type;
